name: Cheri The Cherub!
description:
In this sweet and short game, you take the role of Cheri the little Cherub. Run through the tutorial  to get the basics of the controls down to take down the vile Shellhound!

What'd he do to ya? Well uhhhh nothing really, but he's still rude and deserves a couple hearts to the face! Give it your all in this challenge crafted for the Genre Mash Game Jam! 

The game jam's theme "Reusable" was interpreted by having a powerful, reusable blast of projectiles! It takes a bit to charge though so be prepared to dodge! The genres being mixed together are platformers and bullet hells.

FEATURES:

- Art by yours truly

- A fun little score by a couple pals

- 3? Achievements to unlock 

CREDITS:

Art: Me

Music: Lapsider45 https://twitter.com/lapspider45

                Fluffclipse/https://soundcloud.com/fluffclipse

                 Title screen loop by me.

Sound Effects:

Me

Various free sounds off of Youtube

Notice:

This is still very much a prototype! Comment any bugs or glitches that may occur and I'll be sure to potentially patch them. I'm new to all this so there might be sound errors too. Thank you for playing!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THERE IS NOTHING IN THE CLOUDS.

YOU ARE DOOMED TO FAIL.

I WILL BE WATCHING FROM WHERE YOU CANNOT GO.
